attributes.comment:
I am in the process of adopting a child from China. We have had no success in
adopting in the US (birth mother changing mind) that we moved forward and
applied to China. This has been a huge financial hardship to our family for the
various fees that the US and China charges , as well as when we have to travel to
China. Increasing the fees by 66 % of what they currently are now will be an even
added expense to our adoption. This will put us over our budget for the adoption
that and will now make it possible that we won't be able to through with the
adoption. I implore you to please not raise the fees at this time. I do believe that
the US has to have the families in mind first who are going to adopt and realize
the financial burden adoption has become just to give a child who doesn't have a
family a home. Please don't raise these fees!!!!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Patricia Corcoran
